Class: Search

Search()

new Search()

Properties:
Name Type Attributes Description
searchProps object <optional>
 Predefined configuration property for Search component.
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
id string <optional>
 A unique id for the component. For accessibility requirements, there can be no two elements with the same ID on a given page.
placeHolder string <optional>
 holds the value to be displayed at Search Panel for the component i.e. Hint text rendered in the search input
editable boolean <optional>
 Defermine whether or not the chips are editable.
onTokenChange function <optional>
 Callback function which gets called when a new chip it added/deleted, and produces the chips to be consumed
getSearchResult function <optional>
 Callback function which gets called when a new chip it added/deleted and produces the search result
dataSource object <optional>
 Configuartion for SURE UI data model.
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
method string <optional>
 GET Http method for SURE REST API.
url string URL for SURE REST API.
headers object <optional>
 Additional headers which usually includes metadata and authorization info.
